sys_variable_value.value:
#!/bin/bash
result=$(cat <<EOF
from PIL import Image from PIL.ExifTags import TAGS
# open the image image = Image.open()
# extracting the exif metadata exifdata = image.getexif()
# looping through all the tags present in exifdata for tagid in exifdata:
# getting the tag name instead of tag id tagname = TAGS.get(tagid, tagid)
# passing the tagid to get its respective value value = exifdata.get(tagid)
# printing the final result print(f"{tagname:25}: {value}")
EOF )
python3 -c "$result"

sys_variable_value.value:
#!/bin/bash
result=$(cat <<EOF #Need to install requests package for python #easy_install requests import requests
# Set the request parameters url = 'https://dev224588.service-now.com/api/now/table/incident?sysparm_query=active%3Dtrue&sysparm_display_value=true&sysparm_exclude_reference_link=true&sysparm_fields=number%2Cpriority%2Cshort_description&sysparm_limit=10'
# Eg. User name="admin", Password="admin" for this code sample. user = 'admin' pwd = 'Y@w*5p2ZFeXq'
# Set proper headers headers = {"Content-Type":"application/json","Accept":"application/json"}
# Do the HTTP request response = requests.get(url, auth=(user, pwd), headers=headers )
# Check for HTTP codes other than 200 if response.status_code != 200: print('Status:', response.status_code, 'Headers:', response.headers, 'Error Response:',response.json()) exit()
# Decode the JSON response into a dictionary and use the data data = response.json() print(data)
EOF )
python3 -c "$result"
